item.content:encoded:
Ice Cream Scoop Classroom Valentine’s Day Card

Top 5! Ice Cream Scoop Classroom Valentine’s Day Card – Valentines Day Cards Popular Ice Cream Scoop Classroom Valentine’s Day Card good product Ice Cream Scoop Classroom Valentine’s Day Card See more about itChill out this Valentine’s Day with these cute ice cream themed classroom valentines. Fun design in a soft muted color palette features scoops of chocolate, vanilla, and blue raspberry ice cream in a waffle cone topped with chocolate syrup and sprinkles. "Here’s the scoop – you’re the coolest" appears on the ice cream scoops. Personalize with your child’s name. Open space at the top for hand writing each recipient’s name. Price:$1.74

Ice Cream Scoop Classroom Valentine’s Day Card
